rules_text:
You may look at the top card of your library any time.
You may play lands and cast spells from the top of your library.
As long as your main library has ten or fewer cards in it, you may cast spells without paying their mana costs.
flavor_text:
[i]“I've had a vision, almost like a prophecy...”
—Remi Amber, Slyten Specialist[/i]
